channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- VNS-L21
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- VNS-L21

item.title: CVE-2017-17307|2024-08-05T20:51:30.591Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- vns-l21
item.description: Some Huawei Smartphones with software of VNS-L21AUTC555B141 have an out-of-bounds read vulnerability. Due to the lack string terminator of string, an attacker tricks a user into installing a malicious application, and the application can exploit the vulnerability and make attacker to read out of bounds and possibly cause the device abnormal.

item.title: CVE-2017-17306|2024-08-05T20:51:30.727Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- vns-l21
item.description: Some Huawei Smartphones with software of VNS-L21AUTC555B141, VNS-L21C10B160, VNS-L21C66B160, VNS-L21C703B140 have an array out-of-bounds read vulnerability. Due to the lack verification of array, an attacker tricks a user into installing a malicious application, and the application can exploit the vulnerability and make attacker to read out of bounds of array and possibly cause the device abnormal.
